entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Indin River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
